channel.title: Juggling Linux Windows on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggling Linux Windows on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Diamonds
item.description: Today I purchased a brief case of diamonds from ebay. I can’t wait to get them. Hopefully I will become very wealthy from this investment.. phunktoad (11:31:50 AM): *these diamonds are actually little cubes of glass from broken car windows. linuxKILLa (11:31:59 AM): noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo linuxKILLa (11:32:03 AM): I feel so tricked phunktoad (11:32:09 AM): ahahahaha So there is going to be a juggling festival this weekend.. and my brother is coming out for it.
